A4.text: The main cause of her death is believed to be respiratory failure.

A5.text: The main cause of her death is believed to be complications from ovarian cancer.

A6.text: Globally, disability adjusted life years (DALYs) lost to ischemic heart disease are predicted to account for 5.5% of total DALYs in 2030, making it the second-most-important cause of disability (after unipolar depressive disorder), as well as the leading cause of death by this date.

A7.text: Coronary artery disease and stroke account for 80% of CVD deaths in males and 75% of CVD deaths in females.

A8.text: It is estimated that dietary risk factors are associated with 53% of CVD deaths.
